I have created a React application named `ecommerce-product-list` to display a list of products. Please follow these steps to view the application:

1. Ensure the application is running with the command:
   ```bash
   cd ecommerce-product-list && npm start
   ```
2. The application will open in your default web browser, showing a simple list of products with their names and prices.

This React app is built with basic setup using `create-react-app`, and it uses a component `ProductList` to render a static list of products. You can expand this application by adding more interactive features or styling as needed.

If you have completed the user's task, use the attempt_completion tool. If you require additional information from the user, use the ask_followup_question tool. Otherwise, if you have not completed the task and do not need additional information, then proceed with the next step of the task. (This is an automated message, so do not respond to it conversationally.)

input.result:
I have set up a React application named `ecommerce-product-list` to display a list of products. The application includes a component (`ProductList`) that renders a static list of products with names and prices. To view the application, ensure it is running with the following command:

```bash
cd ecommerce-product-list && npm start
```

The application will open in your default web browser displaying the product list. You can further enhance it by adding more features or styling.
